title: Can You Handle It?
description: It all started with a sext message...Well, it actually "ended," but that's a story for another day.Freshly divorced, I decide to spend a week at a luxury retreat for singles.I should've known better...The only man I manage to "meet" is my massage therapist, who is way too young for me, but that doesn't stop him from pursuing me at the resort.He makes it all too tempting, all too easy to say yes.Thankfully, I manage to check out without giving in, but he shows up at my doorstep days later to finish what we started.The thing is, his age isn't the only problem between us.He's also my best friend's younger brother...
author: Whitney G.
